website_summaries.verdict: Can clean your pool in less than an afternoon and cleans all areas equally well. Powerful motor is also energy efficient.
pros: Filter on this model is easy to clean and the cleaner itself is great at handling even fine particles on your pool's bottom
It rarely gets stuck and climbs walls with ease
cons: There's no quick-clean option and sometimes when removing it from the pool, debris can escape

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be!
customer_reviews.text: My previous Tiger Shark lasted 12 years. I have had this one 10 months and used it only 12 times, and it is not climbing the walls of my pool. I am having a very difficult time getting help with the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I owned a hayward tiger shark for the last 5 year and it broke so I bought this one.
customer_reviews.text: This tiger shark comes out of my pool or gets stuck constantly. This model is awful and I wouldn't recommend it at all. It is so cheaply made I can barely get the filters to keep in place and it has never done a complete cycle. Make it about 20 minutes in my pool and gets stuck and turn its self off or completely goes outside of my pool and turns off. Don't waste your money it is not built like my one 5 years ago!! Super upset to have wasted the money
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peters

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to my pool builder!
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to my pool builder and bought a Dolphin. Have owned this for about 2 1/2 years and have had constant problems. I have a small pool and have kept the filters and the unit clean. Contrary to popular belief, it does not have the ability to "map" your pool since it does not have any kind of processor or memory module (Ever seen a firmware update from Hayward?). The belts are cheaply constructed, have no fabric reinforcement and do not last very long. It is hard to believe that the same cmpany that makes Hayward pumps, controllers and other pool equipment made this. Very high priced unit with cheap plastic components.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Motor died after using 6 months total  use !!  Cost  $1000. now I need to buy a new vacumm cleaner,
customer_reviews.text: this tiget Shark worked very well, but <<>>>> I bought it in June 2015, this summer I TOOK IT OUT AND THE MOTOR THAT VACUMS DOOES NOT WORK, I was told it would cost about $500 to fox. I can not believe I only got two year out of this cleaner, I did not use it that often Our season in RI is very short June 15 througt Sept 1, then pool is closed,
customer_reviews.author: Janice Archer

customer_reviews.title: 7 years solid performance, no issues, cleans even fine sand
customer_reviews.text: 7 years solid performance. It cleans pool so well. Before I had it, it was a constant battle to keep pool clean and the algae was winning. This thing gets the fine sand off the bottom of a granite pool. I’ve never had an issue with it. I keep it inside furnished basement most the time, but have left it outside and even in the pool for multiple days on many occasions. After 7 years, motor has given our (shuts off after a few seconds of powering on and reset doesn’t fix). I’m going to order replacement motor for $242. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Cleaner, Best Price Around
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this product a few days ago. Cost me almost $1000 but Amazon did have the cheapest price by far. Let me start by saying that Amazon.com is the ONLY website ill spend that kind of money on these days. But as far as the product goes it works flawlessly and its cleaned my entire pool 3 times already. Very easy to setup and user friendly. It actually climbs the wall of the pool up and down to clean every little part of the pool. if your looking for a top of the line pool cleaner look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Probably jinxed myself but this is a great pool vacuum. It certainly climbs the walls and easy to clean. My only drawback is that is seems to gravitate to the same area while cleaning. I have to pull the cord to drop it in another area of the pool. I wouldn't hold that from purchasing it though. It really does a fine job and super easy cleaning filters.
customer_reviews.author: Floridave13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pool sweep but very disappointed in that it stopped working in 3 years - 1 year after the warranty expired. The motor stopped working is costs about 2/3 of the price to replace. Will not buy another Hayward product!
customer_reviews.author: EG in VA

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner Drive Belt - WEAK
customer_reviews.text: The TigerShark worked very well until one of the cleaner drive belts broke on 8/30. This is an expensive piece of pool equipment and the return window is no longer valid. It appears that I am going to have to replace the cleaner drive belt without any way to inform Amazon or Hayward of the situation and their offer to make this right after only having this in my possession for 60 days and not even using it for all of those days.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job of picking the fine dirt on the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of picking the fine dirt on the bottom of the pool, but it doesn't pick up larger debris like palm fronds and require a fair amount of maintenance to keep it climbing to the top of the walls.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Parts issue
customer_reviews.text: The cylinder used to have 2 holes drilled and screwed in for maximum stability. New parts only have one hole, therefore only held on with one, which eventually snaps the plastic. Need to go back to drilling the 2 screw holes. Never had this problem until this started.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: including the fine silt that likes to accumulate in the deep end
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit after doing a lot of research last spring, and it worked flawlessly for me the entire 2014 pool season. For the first time in my 10 years as a pool owner I was not overwhelmed by having to vacuum everyday (my pool is surrounded by lots of trees and bushes). Dropped it in in the morning and it had my entire 44x22 pool clean by lunch, including the fine silt that likes to accumulate in the deep end. Flip it upside down and spend 5 minutes using the hose to clean out the two filters; and that was it. No mechanical issues and the filter set looks good to go for this season.
customer_reviews.author: James Kurz

customer_reviews.title: I love the Shark
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of cleaning this machine; its easy to use and does a great job. I have an oval swimming pool and it does miss cleaning some areas of the pool. Hope it will eventually adjust its self to find these missed areas. I have only used it 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: Clif Hattett

customer_reviews.title: Not so impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far not so impressed. After opening the pool I have run this about 8 hours total and it has yet to cover the entire pool. Doesn't climb the ways, doesn't do steps and doesn't even get up the ramp portion in the deep end which is less than 90 degree angles! It seems to bump the wall frequently. I watch it for a few minutes and it bumped 15 times before it actually shifted far enough down the length to get to the deep end and then stopped bumping because it couldn't climb up the ramp! I'm hoping after running it a few more times it will work better. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Corgi Mom

customer_reviews.title: I bought the caddy to protect it and took extremely good care of it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item, May of 2016, last year I had to have it worked on. The third pool season, it is not working at all. I bought the caddy to protect it and took extremely good care of it. This is a shame, it works great when it worked. I have had several back surgeries and am very disappointed the little amount I was able to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pool spotless
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Just turn it on and let it go and your pool is clean in about 3 hours. I never use the remote control, but it does work as advertised, I just never need it. I usually run it a couple of times before cleaning the filters. Only issue is the switch on the control unit becomes very hard to operate as soon as it is in the weather a while. Not really a problem, just unplug it and plug it back in and off it goes. Filters are easy to clean as is the rest of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgraded Tiger Shark QC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new upgraded version of my seven year old Tiger Shark. It worked flawlessly! I love the new color, especially the gray color of the rollers. My old Tiger Shark was blue with clear colored rollers that always showed stains on them. Tiger Shark is the very best pool cleaner on the market. If my old Tiger Shark lasted for seven years, I fully believe I got my moneys worth out of it. I may just order a new motor for the old one and keep it as a spare! I need to add that the item arrived super fast in it's original manufacturers box with no damage!
customer_reviews.author: Janice H. Seigler

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for pool with curves
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum but I wouldn’t recommend it if you have any curves to your pool. After using it for four years, it chipped small holes in our fiberglass pool. Our pool is a Grecian shape, straight sides but curved ends.
customer_reviews.author: WGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cord twists into a tangled mess!
customer_reviews.text: After about the 4th time using it, the power cord started getting massively twisted. I have to unkink it, then pull it around my pillars and furniture to try to straighten it. Leave it that way for at least a day. As soon as I take it off, about 1/4 of it immediately twists up again. Then when I put it in the pool, the twisted cord keeps it from going to the other end of the pool because it twists badly well before the 4 hour cycle is over.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, but it works decently.
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend. Don't get me wrong it gets the job done, after 3 cycles!!! Our pool is by a lot of trees so I need to use this daily. It misses corners and steps. We have a large pool and it doesn't seem to get the whole thing even after a "full cycle" I do really like the simplicity of cleaner the filters though. If I were to buy another robot again, I would get one with a remote so you can quickly get the areas that these things miss. Trust me spend another couple hundred and get one with those capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Marisha

customer_reviews.title: My last one lasted about 6 years and I tried a different brand and returned it because it would not clean entire pool like this
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. My last one lasted about 6 years and I tried a different brand and returned it because it would not clean entire pool like this one does. Does excellent job filtering even small dirt. You should see the inside the first time I use it in spring with all the worms and leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: used it about 7 times and it did a really good job. I went to use it yesterday and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year in May 2015, used it about 7 times and it did a really good job. I went to use it yesterday and it won't turn on and I can't find anyway to contact amazon to ak what I need to do to rectify it. I'm sure there is a year warranty but I don't know who to contact to submit what I need Very frustrating, I have been on Amazon trying to find a way to contact them and I haven't had any success! As far as the product when it worked, it was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: ... our "shark" for about a year and it's working great! No problems at all
customer_reviews.text: We've had our "shark" for about a year and it's working great! No problems at all. We should probably use it more, but that's on us! Every time we run it and we look at the pool afterwards, we say how great it looks. Cleaning the filters is a little messy, but that's just because it picks up everything it should when it's working! It's crazy to watch it climb the walls. Impressive little machine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing and so simple to use
customer_reviews.text: We recieved our TigerShark yesterday...We had never purchased one of these because of the cost....Now I really wish we had!!! It is amazing and so simple to use. I would recomment it to anyone. It is also much cheaper to buy on line than in a pool store. We saved at least $300. I wish I knew how it knew where it had been and where it needed to go in the pool!!! There was debrie near one of the drains in the bottom. It went right over it, and it just disappeared!!! Next year our pool will be much cleaner than it was this year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I hate it! It doesn’t clean the whole pool. It decides what parts it wants to clean. What I hate more is the price we paid for it to clean where it wants to clean. We did a lot of research prior to this purchase. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D.K. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, but haven't challenged it with heavy leaves yet.
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far, I've had it for three weeks now. Actually does a better job than I thought on small sand/grit. Doesn't get tangled on its own cord, like I thought it would. High-centered on the main drain once, but not since. Haven't tried it with heavy leaves, but it hasn't had a problem with the few leaves that have mad it to the bottom. I recommend the storage cart, otherwise the rubber rollers will get bent/deformed with upright storage. Has saved HOURS of hand-vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: John Grider

customer_reviews.title: Vwey Good Pool Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this cleaner about six times, but have found it easy to use and effective at cleaning. If it lasts more than one season, will give it even higher rating. The cleaner I had prior to this one (a different brand) was purchased in August 2014 and did not work in the spring of 2015; it was used only 3 months. This Hayward cleaner is much superior in ease of use and hopefully in longevity.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Weak Plastic Seam
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it worked. After 1.5 seasons, the seam between the light grey and dark gray section on one side split. I sealed the split with epoxy and used it most of the rest of the season before it split again. At this price, I expected better build quality and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Postnospam

customer_reviews.title: Really Love this Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is great for those smaller cleanups of stuff on the bottom and sides of the pool. It actually climbs the walls of my vinyl in ground pool.Very cool. It's very easy to clean the unit and filters. The cord is more than long enough, unlike other brands. Although it can be heavy, especially when wet, it's not so bad that it cannot be lifted by a moderately strong person.
customer_reviews.author: Konagal

customer_reviews.title: has been amazing. They get 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The drive belt broke exactly 11 days and 3 uses after purchase. Completely broke in two. Not too impressed. Before it broke it worked OK, although it constantly gets caught on the pool drains and I have to watch it the whole time it runs. I believe I can purchase a part to remedy that but at almost 1000.00 dollars it should be able to navigate itself over the drains. Amazon Customer Service, however, has been amazing. They get 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Shiela Bailey

customer_reviews.title: different model no.
customer_reviews.text: the shark seems to be working just fine but we had an issue with the fact that we ordered a different catalog number than we received--ordered rc9950gr and received rc9950cub.. called hayward and was told there was no difference in quality but the cub had a remote.. which we didn't receive.. all is good now but took some research to make sure we got the same product we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: maria s.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning very difficult
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy this again. Each time I clean the filters and the box that catches the debris it is a project. The other type that uses a bag instead seems much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Kravz

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this little machine for cleaning up debris in the pool.  Never gets hung up and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up and even more simple to operate. Hang in a protected area near an outlet. Plug it in, turn it on. Cleans up large leaves and tiny grains of grit. Clean with a garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: THE best pool cleaner I have used
customer_reviews.text: THE best pool cleaner I have used! Picks up grains of sand! Got tiny pebbles, leaves, everything! Awesome! Just rinse out filters after each use.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: this thing still works great. Just drop it in and your pool is ...
customer_reviews.text: Two michigan summers later, this thing still works great. Just drop it in and your pool is virtually spotless an hour later. We have a gunite, and every now and then it will stall out on the deep end ladder, but I literally have had no use for my skimmer hose since this guy... great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Shredded Cabbage

customer_reviews.title: it cleans significantly better than my old Hayward Pool Vac
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Takes a little more maintenance than the type that connects to the skimmer intake. You have to clean the filters after each use, and you have to take it out of the pool each time you use it. Other than a little more handling, it cleans significantly better than my old Hayward Pool Vac. I bought a caddy for it which makes it more convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: 3rd season and I LOVE this thing. Use it once - twice a week and 20g heated salt water in New England where the weather is rough and it it takes a lot of abuse with sticks and leaves and sand....still going strong and so easy to clean its filters.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Instuctions, otherwise Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: This thing works awsome. We have an older pool, and didn't know if a suction type cleaner would work. Pool man quit on me whem we weren't home. When we got home there was three weeks worth of debris in the bottom of the pool, Inclung acorns. It picked up everything, incuding the acorns. It doesn't climb the pool steps very well. but a quick brush of with my broom gets it done. I give it 4 stars because the instuctions are not very well written. I would definitly buy another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: The best. I have finally bought 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: The best. I have finally bought 2nd one, after 6 years with the 1st.It does the job, and filters are easily cleanable.
customer_reviews.author: John Grychak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It didn't take long to see the difference. I have a very large pool 20 x 40. does an exceptinal job of kee[ing in spotless. the only drawback is the constitin "refreshing" of the cycle. I wish it had a timer that I could schedule the cleaning periodiaclly through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: matt Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of pool equipment
customer_reviews.text: We moved into an older home that had a built in cement 20x40 pool. Didn't know the first thing of taking care of a pool. In addition we have trees in our yard which really pose a problem for dirt and debris in the pool. We LOVE our TigerShark! It is easy to use and clean. And, best of all, it cleans like a champ! Highly recomend! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great auto cleaner for pools!
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned our pool really well after just using a few times. However, if there was a remote control, would be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth the Investment
customer_reviews.text: Just got my TigerShark yesterday and I love it!!! The entire pool was clean in under 2 hours and I had a lot of small debris (sand and chips of Diamondbrite as the pool was redone 6 weeks ago) in the pool, definitely worth the investment. I will now look forward to Saturday mornings as I can let my TigerShark do all of the work. I researched for days prior to buying this model and the reason I chose it is that in almost every review page I looked at the TigerShark was somewhere in the top 5 of all robotic pool cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: O. DASILVA

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous pool cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the TigerShark for a few weeks now and I couldn't be happier with the unit. It removes every piece of debris from a 40 foot L-shaped pool and it has no problems going up the sides of the pool (read the instructions about the restrictor if necessary), cleans the stairs and even the built-in seats. It is easy to set up and a cinch to clean after use. I prefer the 4 hour cycle rather than the QC cycle as it cleans the pool more thoroughly. As a bonus, it isn't the most expensive out there.
customer_reviews.author: ojochal_steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought one of these years ago!! I have been using it for hte past few weeks and I am very impressed with the unit. I wish I had known about the spring clean up filters. I would have bought them as well. The only thing I have noticed so far is the cord will get twisted up-like a phone cord. For this reason I will not leave it running while I am not around to check on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April of 2016, it quit running in May of 2017. The roller's make a noise like the gear's are slipping, put it in the pool, it will not move. I don't know if anyone else had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: It's cleans really well it wants to stay in deep ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cleans really well it wants to stay in deep end for some reason. The filters takes a lot of time to clean all the really small stuff off the filter. Water spray gets big stuff and I have to use air compressor to blow off each section of the filter but it does pick up real small partials.it also will get stuck on the water return face if I let the pump run while its cleaning . over all I am pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Wouldn't climb from deep end to the shallow end. Couldn't climb walls. Small hole for suction, therefore wouldn't suck up leaves. I returned it and bought a Polaris 9350 which works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: What a difference having this thing. Pool cleaning no longer an issue. Will never go without one again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Had this for five years. Tiger sharks are the best.
customer_reviews.author: richardajohnston

customer_reviews.title: One of those things you never realized was more important then eating.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this thing works so great. I have a 2hp pump on the pool just for cleaning, and had to run it 2 to 3 hours a day, Now i use this thing, usually runs for an hour, then I take it out. Works like magic, expensive as hell, but well worth the money. And over time with the low cost of running this, I will end up money ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Larry McK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and use. I like the Quick clean option. Picks up leaves ,sand and dirt very well. Vacuumed material rarely falls out of the unit when taking it out of the water.The caddy is a useful accessory as it mounts the 24 volt converter and has arms to wrap the electrical cords. This makes it easy to move everything in place for use. Very Pleased
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend. Cord can get wrapped up, but I spend no more than 5 minutes after the cleaning. My pool is cleaner than it was when I paid $250 a month for service. This has really paid for itself in a few months for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Makes me happy
customer_reviews.text: the answer to all my prayers. Not a sexy 2 year old poolboy, but functional.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: This tiger shark cleans the bottom of my pool from ...
customer_reviews.text: This tiger shark cleans the bottom of my pool from dust and tree leaves, but it has some problems with the steps of the stairs I have inside the pool to get in and out. Although sometimes the Tiger Shark gets stuck in the stairs, it usually find the way out, but I have to clean manually some places with a brush. The product performs most of the job, that is why I gave it a 4 star
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: ... for a year or so and it still performs like it should
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for a year or so and it still performs like it should. Had to replace the drive belts once but still works good.
customer_reviews.author: thomas english

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a Polaris before getting the tiger shark .. The shark is by far.. Hands down the best pool cleaning tool out there.. Wish we had bought it sooner...it does what it says..climbs the walls with ease and never gets stuck in one spot.. Eliminates brushing.. Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's bigger than I expected though
customer_reviews.text: I have had to hand vacuum my pool since owning this. Love it! It's bigger than I expected though, and somewhat heavy. Fine for me, but someone else might struggle with it. Get the caddy that goes with it, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schroeck

customer_reviews.title: It's a Beast.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little beast it does much better than the older version each new model gets better and better. It's also a lot faster than the older versions. I run the full cycle in my pool is sparkling by the end.
customer_reviews.author: William N. Richards

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only two downpoints 1) It gets stuck on the pool drain. We constantly have to check it and pull the cord to "unstick" it. 2) The filters do require being pulled out and sprayed with a Spray gun.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far this performs as advertised. Easy to set up, clean and store. Pop it in the pool and it cleans everything very efficiently. Does have trouble on my stairs but those are easy to brush off. Hasn't gotten stuck on the tile line like some others have reported. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erika M. Tandy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After working with the mfr. the unit is STILL climbing too high. I complained about this defect to the seller. They asked me to contact manufacturer, and dragged out process until it was beyond their 30-day return policy. Now I have a defective unit and the seller is refusing to refund!
customer_reviews.author: DMADF

customer_reviews.title: but does the job much better. Now will it last for years
customer_reviews.text: I have used all the major vacuum hose style cleaners and this beats them all by far. It's expensive, compared to the others, but does the job much better. Now will it last for years?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Beuschel

customer_reviews.title: I love this automatic robotic pool cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this automatic robotic pool cleaner. It does a wonderful job of cleaning my 20 x 40 foot swimming pool. I love the independence of this pool cleaner, i.e. that it operate free from the pool's equipment. It is awesome, and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Patricia Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. I love it
customer_reviews.text: OMG. This is awesome. I love it. I was without pool equipment for a couple of weeks while a switched from a chlorine system to an Ecosmart system (copper and titanium) and this jewel kept my pool almost completely clean. Now that my equipment is back up and running, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Does a very good job of cleaning the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Overall works well. Does occasionally hang up on bottom drain.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H Jaekle

customer_reviews.title: Beyond My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Received my TSQC on May 29, 2014 and I could not be happier. My pool has a walking ledge around the deep end and Hayward told me that the TS would not continue climbing the wall above the ledge, but it does. My pool has never been so clean, nor looked so good. It has many curves, four seating areas, about 25000 gallons and the TSQC cleans it all beautifully each time. I clean the filters thoroughly each time and the cleaning suction is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Hamil

customer_reviews.title: Its our best friend! We enjoy our patio more and let ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than we expected! Its our best friend! We enjoy our patio more and let the Hayward TigerShark do ALL the work in the hot sun!! I would recommend this shipper to EVERYONE!!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Chilcott

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The shark works great- I previously had the aquabot, and it got stuck in the deep end and the filters were a pain to change The tigershark is easy to use and is very fast. It climbs the walls with ease. The only drawback is that it occasionally gets hung up on the floor drains, but it works itself off of them. I would absolutely recommend, use it once every other week and never hand clean again.
customer_reviews.author: bcm

customer_reviews.title: Dependability!
customer_reviews.text: Best pool cleaner I've owned, Been a pool, owner for 36 years with 3 different pools.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nichols

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one! The first lasted four ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one! The first lasted four years and climbed the walls,just got it today and it won't climb the walls:(( hats wrong????? Do I need you to send me a new one??? Thanks so
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Third time is the charm
customer_reviews.text: We had a Polaris last two years, then a refurb Dolphin last one. We had a pool party planned and were without one. We loaned a 4-5 year old TigerShark from a church member. It impressed us enough to buy one. I was able to register the 3 year warranty on my online purchase too.
customer_reviews.author: Marc J

customer_reviews.title: I used this pool cleaner for most of the summer and it is awesome. It took longer to train but it cleans ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I used this pool cleaner for most of the summer and it is awesome. It took longer to train but it cleans every part of the pool--including the steps. The filter is easy to clean which is a huge time safer. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jody B. Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out of the box. Tried it three ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work out of the box. Tried it three times. It seemed to work after the third attempt. If it continues to work, I will not send it back. Have used Tiger Shark pool cleaners before and had not issues; Have an issue now.
customer_reviews.author: tyrone smith

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! I don't know what I was thinking holding ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I don't know what I was thinking holding off on purchasing this for so long. It has made pool cleaning so much less stressful!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnette James

customer_reviews.title: Tiger shark robot
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the more expensive Dolphin model we usually borrowed from our neighbor 😉. A great value & it shipped out to us in a few days. The best Fathers Day gift from which we all benefit!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3Boys

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 1/2 :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just under 2 years ago and already it doesn't work. When it was working it didn't get along the edges very well and there was always a large spot in the shallow end that never got picked up. I heard the Tiger Sharks were great cleaners but I am less than impressed by the cleaning and even more unimpressed by the fact you pay over $800 for something and it doesn't even last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the Tiger Shark for the first time in a dirty pool with lots of leaves on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I tried using the Tiger Shark for the first time in a dirty pool with lots of leaves on the bottom. It did not work well as the leaves just clogged the cleaner. Now that I have the pool fairly clean after using the conventional pump vacuum, I will use it again to get the finer particles off the bottom. Using the remote does not work all that great. I like the two pleated filters and the ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: EAB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pool cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This thing saves a lot of time! No more having to stand at the pool for hours trying to vacuum it! I'd say it cleans it up about 90% of the trash in the pool. It's fantastic! I would def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harris

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleaner. I couldn't believe all the things this picked up that I couldn't even see in the bottom of the pool. I feel it was well worth the money spent. So far no complaints with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: G's nanny

customer_reviews.title: I have tried all recommendations I could find on the Internet and those recommended be Hayward to no avail
customer_reviews.text: Climbs too high on the walls and flips backwards. I have tried all recommendations I could find on the Internet and those recommended by Hayward to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Bill6973

customer_reviews.title: ONCE YOU BUY YOU ARE ON YOUR OWN DO NOT EXPECT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: VERY BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE FORGET ABOUT WARRANTY BEWARE DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Elsa L. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST PURCHASE EVER! for the pool, our pool was clear all summer and it was easy to use. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MikeO

customer_reviews.title: Hayward warranty is good, but inconvenient for a product that is almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these at a local pool store years ago and had many,many years of outstanding usage. When it came time to buy a new one, we ordered one online. It worked for only about 6 weeks. Online store wouldn't help us since longer than 30 days from purchase date. Hayward warranty is good, but inconvenient for a product that is almost new and hardly used. Would buy one again, but only from a local store that would stand behind their products that should last years instead of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: rh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does all it claims. Will sometimes hang up on a raised main floor drain.
customer_reviews.author: rudy moritz

customer_reviews.title: I tried other types of cleaners,
customer_reviews.text: but the Tiger Shark (and perhaps others that run on electricity and not the pool pump) is hands down the best pool cleaner I've used. My first TS died after about 8 years of use. Trying to save money I tried other types, but they did a poor job because A) stayed in one area of the pool, B) got hung up C) didn't climb the sides and steps for complete clean. The others also required significantly more time and effort to run.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Webb

customer_reviews.title: I manually clean the filter each day as that fills up pretty quickly and hose it out
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, I run it for about 3 hours each day unless there is a dust storm then I run it for 6 hours. I manually clean the filter each day as that fills up pretty quickly and hose it out. Get the caddy cart to make ease of storage and moving it around better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N.

customer_reviews.title: Does not get the corners of our pool. Typically ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not get the corners of our pool. Typically have to run it twice and still doesn't get the corners. Gets stuck on the drains several times during cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Heffernan

customer_reviews.title: Make keeping the pool clean a snap....
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made for the pool, keeps the pool filter cleaner and pulls everything off the bottom. I throw it in before bed, get up the next morning to a clean pool. I now spend more time in the pool that cleaning the pool!
customer_reviews.author: W. Blaylock

customer_reviews.title: Cost, performance, upkeep are the reasons we like it.
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased three of these over the span of 15 years and will continue to because this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It cleans very well. I'm on my second one ...
customer_reviews.text: It cleans very well. I'm on my second one after 8 years the first spent in the pool 24/7 even in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Purchased exactly 1 year and 2 months ago. Now ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased exactly 1 year and 2 months ago. Now it will not work and no one will touch it. We should have bought another dirt devil that lasted about 5 years. NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Dean Brown

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by our pool installer
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by our pool installer. My kids love watching this machine clean the pool. They get really excited when it climb the wall. It cleans and scrub the pool efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: did fail after 9 month. Difficult to get help ...
customer_reviews.text: did fail after 9 month. Difficult to get help and warranty repair if you are away from repair stations .
customer_reviews.author: Johannes

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This thing is crap. I used it for 3 months and then it quit working. Amazon won't take it back and I can't find any place that will do warranty repair on it. The manufacturer is a joke as well. They list warranty repair places and none of them actually will repair it. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT OR ANYTHING FROM THIS VENDOR.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I put it in the pool turn it on and come back, the pool clean. worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes pool cleaning sooooo easy! The filter is a bit of a pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes pool cleaning sooooo easy! The filter is a bit of a pain in the butt to clean, but as long as you use a powerful nozzle it isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hayward TigerShark worth every dime spent!
customer_reviews.text: Was sent on time and works wonderful. Love it. Cleans the pool sides, bottom and all to all expectations. Absolute great buy.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I restarted the unit every day, multiple times,
customer_reviews.text: I restarted the unit every day, multiple times, and two weeks later there were places in my pool where it had never visited
customer_reviews.author: John p kutisk

customer_reviews.title: It does a nice job of cleaning the pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Polaris 9300SPORT. It does a nice job of cleaning the pool, though I have found it does tend to get hung up on the main pool drain. My one real complaint, is that you have to very careful removing it from the pool, otherwise it tends to "leak" debris right back into the pool.
customer_reviews.author: polarbear

product_meta.title: Hayward RC9950GR TigerShark Automatic Robotic Pool Cleaner
product_meta.description: Style:StandardHayward Robotic cleaners are the most energy efficient cleaners available. Floor and wall cleaning with tile line scrubbing.
feature_bullets: Perfect for residential pools up to 20' x 40'
Standard 3-hour complete cleaning cycle for full floor, walls, coves and waterline
Built with an efficient 24-volt motor designed to use less energy and lower cost
On-board pump for intense vacuum power to suck up dirt and debris
Cleanup is easy with the patented filter cartridge system - just remove and rinse with a garden hose

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars424 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
